data.body:
I have run into this same problem with the BoxHelper, when trying to add a BoxHelper as child to a box-shaped cell, and then clone the cell. So I would certainly appreciate further progress in this PR. Keep up the good work! :-)

IMO, adding an optional color parameter to the BoxHelper is a no-brainer, but then again I am not the owner of this project.

I could use the BoundingBoxHelper, but that one adds diagonals on the faces, for some reason.
Would be nice if this was reopened and merged. Let me know if I can help. I'm mainly interested in being able to clone BoxHelpers at least, if that's less controversial.
